name: ati-stats

values.description: Programmes-frontend will provide data for use in ATI Stats
Programmes-frontend will NOT provide data for use in ATI Stats and will fall back to orbit default

description: Choose whether to use ATI/Vulkan Stats

name: ati-bucket

values.description: Programmes-Frontend will write stats to the ATI TEST bucket (Assuming ATI-Stats dial is true)
Programmes-Frontend will write stats to the ATI LIVE bucket (Assuming ATI-Stats dial is true) - DO NOT ENABLE BEFORE FEB

description: Choose whether to use the TEST or LIVE buckets for ATI Stats
